name: hardhat-multichain-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate and test environment for the hardhat-multichain plugin

scripts.log-setup: mkdir -p logs && echo 'Starting deployment. Check logs for details :)'
scripts.fork:ethereum: yarn log-setup && DEBUG=hardhat* HH_CHAIN_ID=69 yarn hardhat customFork --n ethereum --b 21625925 --show-stack-traces > ./logs/ethereum-fork-node.log
scripts.fork:polygon: yarn log-setup && DEBUG=hardhat* HH_CHAIN_ID=42  yarn hardhat customFork --n polygon --b  66703587 --show-stack-traces > ./logs/polygon-fork-node.log
scripts.fork:sepolia: yarn log-setup && DEBUG=hardhat* HH_CHAIN_ID=11169111 yarn hardhat customFork --n sepolia --b 7200064 --show-stack-traces > ./logs/sepolia-fork-node.log
scripts.fork:amoy: yarn log-setup && DEBUG=hardhat* HH_CHAIN_ID=80042 yarn hardhat customFork --n amoy --b 16869384 --show-stack-traces > ./logs/amoy-fork-node.log
scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const hardhatMultichainDir = path.join(__dirname, 'node_modules', 'hardhat-multichain'); if (fs.existsSync(hardhatMultichainDir)) { const tsconfig = { compilerOptions: { target: 'ES2018', module: 'commonjs', lib: ['ES2018', 'ES2018.Promise', 'DOM'], declaration: true, declarationMap: true, sourceMap: true, outDir: './dist/src', strict: true, noImplicitAny: true, strictNullChecks: true, strictFunctionTypes: true, noImplicitReturns: true, noFallthroughCasesInSwitch: true, noImplicitOverride: true, rootDirs: ['./src'], esModuleInterop: true, allowSyntheticDefaultImports: true, resolveJsonModule: true, skipLibCheck: true, forceConsistentCasingInFileNames: true, moduleResolution: 'node', types: ['node'] }, exclude: ['dist', 'node_modules', 'coverage', '.nyc_output'], include: ['./src/**/*.ts'] }; const configPath = path.join(hardhatMultichainDir, 'tsconfig.json'); fs.writeFileSync(configPath, JSON.stringify(tsconfig, null, 2)); console.log('✅ Created tsconfig.json for hardhat-multichain'); try { execSync('npm run build', { cwd: hardhatMultichainDir, stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('✅ Built hardhat-multichain successfully'); } catch (error) { console.error('❌ Failed to build hardhat-multichain:', error.message); process.exit(1); } } else { console.log('⚠️  hardhat-multichain directory not found, skipping build'); }"
